channel.title: Trilalla RSPS - More than any other server
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/8923/8emv.png[/img]
Trilalla is a new RSPS that is based on community and how the community wants a server to be. Trilalla is something where no is not the answer but Yes is. Trilalla will allow you to place your views into account and any ideas you want in the server will try and get into the server.
Trilalla is now fully released and is now on ECO. Thx to anyone for reporting bugs :)
[size=18pt][url=http://trilalla.com/forums]Forums[/url] ~ [url=http://trilalla.com/]Play Now[/url] ~ [url=http://trilalla.com/Trilalla.jar]Download Client[/url][/size]
Have a look at our trailer: [youtube]http://youtu.be/uxALReZSRtQ[/youtube]
[size=18pt][b]Features: [/b][/size]
- The usual stuff that every server has like Jad, GWD etc...... - Fishing Trawler - Barbarian Assault (good old one) - Random events, river troll etc... - Ranging guild minigame flawless - Mutant Tarn - The Inadequacy - The Bandit Smuggler - Castle wars Home - FunPK (but mostly every server has that anyway but still) - Flawless Switching - Quests (Still working on right now) - Decent Shops that won't make you too op - No PVP/Vote shop (Don't believe in that type of stuff) - All skills working (all around 90%) - Teleport around the whole or Trilalla - Skills have their own sections - Coloured logs work - Unique rares - No 677 bull that most others have and also no Curses which is goooood - 474 gameframe - No lagg - Most NPCs have Dialogue - Custom Bosses with unique drops - Many Many more...
Here are some pictures :)
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Home.png[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Monsters.png[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Skill%20Teleports.gif[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Prayer.png[/img]
All skill teleports have their own shops [img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Cooking%20Shop.png[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Fletching.png[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Barbarian%20Assault.png[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Boss.png[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Rope.png[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Switching.gif[/img]
[img]http://trilalla.com/forums/pics/Fun%20PK.png[/img][/center]

item.description:
@Gh0stPred wrote:

Mendorphins:

might want to add a link to play in the advert as most people won’t bother to find the link themselves. yeah just searched the topic and the forums and it isn’t obvious where a play button is so i won’t be a new player for you today i am afraid.

That’s a shame. I have just added client links so you can just download and play.

item.title: Trilalla RSPS - More than any other server
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stPred Gh0stPred
item.description:
@Gh0stPred wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:537682”]looks like a server I would have fun testing for the lols

will get on

edit: you know, it’s actually a pretty nice server and I could be seeing it be a succesful server if it had a playerbase (obviously)

I don’t know what to really say. It has some great features and was totally opposite of what I was expecting (good thing)

I wish you good luck perhaps if I get bored/and the server is out of beta I might play some! Keep me updated via pm or something I would be interested to follow this further.[/quote]

Thx I’ll let you know when the real thing is online

Read full topic
item.source: Trilalla RSPS - More than any other server

item.title: Trilalla RSPS - More than any other server
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

looks like a server I would have fun testing for the lols

will get on

edit: you know, it’s actually a pretty nice server and I could be seeing it be a succesful server if it had a playerbase (obviously)

I don’t know what to really say. It has some great features and was totally opposite of what I was expecting (good thing)

I wish you good luck perhaps if I get bored/and the server is out of beta I might play some! Keep me updated via pm or something I would be interested to follow this further.

Read full topic

item.title: Trilalla RSPS - More than any other server
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stPred Gh0stPred
item.description:
@Gh0stPred wrote:

[center]

Trilalla is a new RSPS that is based on community and how the community wants a server to be. Trilalla is something where no is not the answer but Yes is. Trilalla will allow you to place your views into account and any ideas you want in the server will try and get into the server.

Trilalla is now fully released and is now on ECO. Thx to anyone for reporting bugs

[size=18pt]Forums ~ Play Now ~ Download Client[/size]

Have a look at our trailer:
[youtube]http://youtu.be/uxALReZSRtQ[/youtube]

[size=18pt]Features:
[/size]

  • The usual stuff that every server has like Jad, GWD etc…
  • Fishing Trawler
  • Barbarian Assault (good old one)
  • Random events, river troll etc…
  • Ranging guild minigame flawless
  • Mutant Tarn
  • The Inadequacy
  • The Bandit Smuggler
  • Castle wars Home
  • FunPK (but mostly every server has that anyway but still)
  • Flawless Switching
  • Quests (Still working on right now)
  • Decent Shops that won’t make you too op
  • No PVP/Vote shop (Don’t believe in that type of stuff)
  • All skills working (all around 90%)
  • Teleport around the whole or Trilalla
  • Skills have their own sections
  • Coloured logs work
  • Unique rares
  • No 677 bull that most others have and also no Curses which is goooood
  • 474 gameframe
  • No lagg
  • Most NPCs have Dialogue
  • Custom Bosses with unique drops
  • Many Many more…

Here are some pictures

All skill teleports have their own shops
